title: Rusher.AI | The AI Copilot for Modern Marketing Teams
introduction: Rusher.AI is the first AI Copilot for modern marketing teams, designed to help create amazing content in half the time. It supports over 100 languages and allows users to describe their business, get brainstormed content ideas, and turn them into social media posts, ad copy, cold emails, and more, all in their own brand voice.
targetPeople: Modern marketing teams, content creators, social media managers, and businesses looking to streamline their content creation process.
pricing: Subscription with custom enterprise plans available on request

faqs.question: Can I customize the content generated by Rusher.AI?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can edit the generated content to your liking using the editor.

faqs.question: Does Rusher.AI support multiple projects?
faqs.answer: Yes, Rusher.AI supports working on multiple projects simultaneously.

faqs.question: Is there a free trial available?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can try Rusher.AI for free.

faqs.question: What types of content can Rusher.AI help create?
faqs.answer: Rusher.AI can help create social media posts, ad copy, cold emails, blog posts, and more.

faqs.question: Can I export the content in different formats?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can export the content in various formats such as zip files with pictures or PDF files for LinkedIn.

faqs.question: How does Rusher.AI ensure brand safety?
faqs.answer: Rusher.AI allows you to establish rules for your team to follow to maintain brand safety.

faqs.question: Can I teach Rusher.AI to use my brand voice?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can teach Rusher.AI to use your brand voice when generating content.
